chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
m: X -> X -> X
u: X
n: nat
f: nat -> X

Goal:
∑ (S n) f = f 0 ⊕ ∑ n (fun n : nat => f (S n))

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
msum = fix msum (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) {struct n} : X := match n with | 0 => u | S n0 => f 0 ⊕ msum n0 (fun n1 : nat => f (S n1)) end : nat -> (nat -> X) -> X Arguments msum _%nat_scope _%function_scope
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorEq.cast : VectorDef.t ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> VectorDef.t ?A n0 where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n) -> Fin.t (p + ?m) -> Fin.t (p + ?n) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
msum_0 : forall f : nat -> X, ∑ 0 f = u
Fin.cast : Fin.t ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> Fin.t n0 where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
msum_fold_map : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ n f = fold_right m u (map f (list_an 0 n))
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
gcd.divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.divides (_ _)%nat_scope
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker_sound : forall (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z)) (w : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof), ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker f w = true -> forall env : RingMicromega.PolEnv Z, Tauto.eval_bf (ZMicromega.Zeval_formula env) f
BinIntDef.Z.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => 0%Z | S n0 => Z.pos (Pos.of_succ_nat n0) end : nat -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.of_nat _%nat_scope
ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker = fun (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z)) (w : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof) => Tauto.tauto_checker ZMicromega.Zunsat ZMicromega.Zdeduce ZMicromega.normalise ZMicromega.negate (fun cl : list (RingMicromega.NFormula Z * unit) => ZMicromega.ZChecker (map fst cl)) f w : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z) -> list ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> bool Arguments ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker _ _%list_scope
measure_rect2 : forall (X Y : Type) (m : X -> Y -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y), m x' y' < m x y -> P x' y') -> P x y) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y), P x y
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
Nat.testbit_even_succ : forall a n : nat, 0 <= n -> Nat.testbit (2 * a) (S n) = Nat.testbit a n
Nat.testbit_odd_succ : forall a n : nat, 0 <= n -> Nat.testbit (2 * a + 1) (S n) = Nat.testbit a n
Fin.t_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
ZifyInst.Op_pos_of_nat = {| ZifyClasses.TUOp := fun x : Z => Z.max 1 x; ZifyClasses.TUOpInj := fun x : nat => match x as n return (ZifyClasses.inj (Pos.of_nat n) = Z.max 1 (ZifyClasses.inj n)) with | 0 => eq_refl | S x0 => eq_ind (Pos.of_succ_nat x0) (fun p : positive => ZifyClasses.inj p = Z.max 1 (ZifyClasses.inj (S x0))) (eq_ind (Z.of_nat (Nat.max 1 (S x0))) (fun z : Z => ZifyClasses.inj (Pos.of_succ_nat x0) = z) eq_refl (Z.max (Z.of_nat 1) (Z.of_nat (S x0))) (Nat2Z.inj_max 1 (S x0))) (Pos.of_nat (S x0)) (Pos.of_nat_succ x0) end |} : ZifyClasses.UnOp Pos.of_nat
BinPosDef.Pos.of_nat = fix of_nat (n : nat) : positive := match n with | S (S _ as x) => BinPosDef.Pos.succ (of_nat x) | _ => 1%positive end : nat -> positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.of_nat _%nat_scope
VectorDef.nth = fun A : Type => fix nth_fix (m : nat) (v' : VectorDef.t A m) (p : Fin.t m) {struct v'} : A := match p in (Fin.t m') return (VectorDef.t A m' -> A) with | @Fin.F1 n => VectorDef.caseS (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => A) (fun (h : A) (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A n0) => h) | @Fin.FS n p' => fun v : VectorDef.t A (S n) => VectorDef.caseS (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => Fin.t n0 -> A) (fun (_ : A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n0) (p0 : Fin.t n0) => nth_fix n0 t p0) v p' end v' : forall (A : Type) (m : nat), VectorDef.t A m -> Fin.t m -> A Arguments VectorDef.n...
gcd.euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
Nat.sqrt_up = fun a : nat => match 0 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.sqrt (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.sqrt_up _%nat_scope
VectorDef.shiftrepeat = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.rectS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n))) (fun h : A => VectorDef.cons A h 1 (VectorDef.cons A h 0 (VectorDef.nil A))) (fun (h : A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)) (H : (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n0))) n v) => VectorDef.cons A h (S (S n)) H) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n0))) n v Arguments VectorDef.shiftrepeat {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
gcd.is_lcm = fun p q r : nat => gcd.divides p r /\ gcd.divides q r /\ (forall k : nat, gcd.divides p k -> gcd.divides q k -> gcd.divides r k) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.is_lcm (_ _ _)%nat_scope
gcd.is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => gcd.divides r p /\ gcd.divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, gcd.divides k p -> gcd.divides k q -> gcd.divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
VectorDef.tl = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.caseS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A n) (fun (_ : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n) => t) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A n0) n v Arguments VectorDef.tl {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
Nat.log2_up = fun a : nat => match 1 ?= a with | Lt => S (Nat.log2 (Nat.pred a)) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments Nat.log2_up _%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.of_succ_nat = fix of_succ_nat (n : nat) : positive := match n with | 0 => 1%positive | S x => BinPosDef.Pos.succ (of_succ_nat x) end : nat -> positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.of_succ_nat _%nat_scope
VectorDef.hd = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.caseS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => A) (fun (h : A) (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A n) => h) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => A) n v Arguments VectorDef.hd {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
VectorDef.shiftin = fix shiftin (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A) (v : VectorDef.t A n) {struct v} : VectorDef.t A (S n) := match v in (VectorDef.t _ n0) return (VectorDef.t A (S n0)) with | VectorDef.nil _ => VectorDef.cons A a 0 (VectorDef.nil A) | VectorDef.cons _ h n0 t => VectorDef.cons A h (S n0) (shiftin A n0 a t) end : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), A -> VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.shiftin {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
ZifyClasses.mkrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : S -> T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (I n) (I m)) -> forall (s1 : S) (t1 : T), I s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S) (t2 : T), I s2 = t2 -> R s1 s2 < -> TR t1 t2

reflexivity.
